content.raw:
I’m having the same problem running Docker images, following [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub) tutorial with `tunnel_circuit_practice`\`. Here is the screenshot after driving into the tunnel and back to approximately starting position. `rqt` shows current position at \(-15, 13\):

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3580734627-odometry_error.png)
